vendor_name: Symphony Samudra Beachside Jungle Resort & Spa Port Blair
title: Luxe Beachside Port Blair Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Rediscover the joy of holidaying at Symphony Samudra Beachside Jungle Resort & Spa Port Blair, a gorgeous resort in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, nestled amid a forest reserve and adjoining Chidiya Tapu Biological Park. The newest jewel in the crown of the Symphony resort group, this beachside paradise enjoys one of the most amazing sunset viewpoints and is the only resort in the area with a wellness centre. Only a 35-minute drive from Port Blair International Airport, this Symphony retreat puts you in close proximity to the pristine Chidiya Tapu Beach and promises to immerse you in the unspoiled beauty of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. The infinity pool hanging off a cliff is nothing short of a marvel and the uniquely designed eco-pool flowing through the resort adds to the tranquility of this secluded sanctuary.
location_description: Symphony Samudra Beachside Jungle Resort & Spa Port Blair
offer_address: Symphony Samudra Beachside Jungle Resort And Spa, Next to Biological Park, Chidyatapu Beach Port Blair, Andaman 744105 India
